text: The owner is very helpful and attentive. Whenever I'm with my child, he always ensures the perfect doneness of the half-boiled eggs and even brings the food to our table when he notices I'm unable to manage. The food is great, and he's always willing to accommodate.

The food quality is inconsistent. Thai basil chicken is ok most of the time. Stir fry vegetables with rice is very bad. It's recommended to only order exactly what you know is good. This is not the place to be adventurous.

Good selection of local favourites, with a nice wok-hei for their fried rice and hor fun dishes. Must-try: ice kopi with grass jelly! It's really good! Nice ambience too with the sounds of the swimming pool and a view of the occasional aircraft landing/taking off in the distance.

Good food , better than many other restaurants and zhi char even . Friendly boss OMO operations so might need a little patience sometimes - itâ€™s all worthwhile for sure based on my numerous experience . Char kway teow, and try out the hokkien fried prawn noodles , which will makes you craving for more ....
Good breakfast place i came with my two friends to have some good food had ,kaya toast chicken cutlet with fries and cutlet fried rice topppppp quality
